{{title|1= operator=={{small|(ranges::slide_view::''iterator'', ranges::slide_view::''sentinel''{{sep}})}}}}
{{cpp/ranges/slide_view/navbar}}

{{ddcl|since=c++23|1=
friend constexpr bool operator==( const /*iterator*/&lt;Const&gt;&amp; x, const /*sentinel*/&amp; y );
}}

Compares the underlying iterator of {{c|x}} with the underlying sentinel of {{c|y}}.

Let {{lti|cpp/ranges/slide_view/iterator#Data members|last_ele_}} denote the underlying iterator of {{c|x}} and {{rlpi|/#Data members|end_}} denote the underlying sentinel of {{c|y}}.

Equivalent to: {{c|1=return x.last_ele_ == y.end_;}}.

{{cpp/hidden friend|{{tt|slide_view::''sentinel''}}}}

{{cpp/note synthesized eq}}

===Parameters===
{{par begin}}
{{par|x|an {{lt|cpp/ranges/slide_view/iterator}} to compare}}
{{par|y|a {{rlp|/|sentinel}} to compare}}
{{par end}}

===Return value===
The result of comparison.
